title: Landing page + SEO + marketing setup

task.description: Customize the public landing page content for the app (tone training from URL/paste + draft generation). Wire nav links to Home, Style, Write. Update OG image route to reflect branding text. Add sitemap.ts and robots.ts for indexing control.
acceptance_criteria: F1-AC1: Nav contains working links to "/", "/style", and "/write" and each route renders without a runtime error when clicked.
F1-AC7: Landing page is accessible without authentication and does not call authenticated APIs during server render (no 401 banners on home).
F1-AC4: GET /api/og returns an image response (content-type starts with "image/") with app name present in the rendered output.
F1-AC1: src/app/sitemap.ts exports a valid sitemap including at least "/", "/style", and "/write" URLs.
F1-AC1: src/app/robots.ts exports robots rules allowing indexing of public pages (home) while not erroring at build time.

definition_of_done: Home page copy reflects the SPEC features (URL training, paste fallback, draft generation).
`pnpm build` succeeds and sitemap/robots routes are generated.
ui_requirements: Landing: Hero (title, subtitle, primary CTA to /style, secondary CTA to /write) + feature grid (Train from URL, Paste fallback, Generate drafts). Nav: include links to Home, Style, Write. OG: simple branded image with app name and tagline.
